text: ineziyanimi mets’ihafini yeteset’utini be’asireji hulu bitimet’achewi k’ibilahini ayiketelumi፡፡ anitemi k’ibilachewini teketayi ayidelehimi፡፡ kefilachewimi yekefiluni k’ibila teketayi ayidelumi፡፡ ke‘iwik’etimi (kera‘iyi) kemet’alihi behwala zinibaleyachewini bitiketeli anite yani gize kebedayochi nehi፡፡
